input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree with Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Grande Fir Medium Hinged Tree with 750 Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree with 800 Clear UL listed Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Cosmic Lights By National Tree Company'
  - Name='Puleo International 9' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Davenport Fir 6.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='LuxenHome 7 ft. Pre-Lit White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green'
  - Name='Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5' x 44" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5' Flocked British Columbia Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Haute Decor 4 Foot Pre-Lit Frosted Ashcroft Fir Potted Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM 7.5' Prelit Artificial Christmas Xmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 4.5' Green Medium Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 650 Clear Warm LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit Douglas Fir tree at same height and artificial nature, but different brand and possibly slight stylistic or feature differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit fir tree but a different model/species (Dunhill Fir), so somewhat relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Grande Fir Medium Hinged Tree with 750 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Feel Real technology with hinged branches and clear lights, but a different fir type (Grande Fir) and unspecified size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept Douglas Fir design, similar higher height, pre-lit with a different light type (dual color LEDs) but otherwise very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept fir tree with same height and clear lights, but slim profile; very similar features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree with 800 Clear UL listed Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit Douglas Fir tree, similar brand quality, larger size, with more lights, but different manufacturer and minor differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand downswept Douglas Fir tree but taller and slimmer pencil style, still very related in style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Cosmic Lights By National Tree Company
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept Douglas Fir tree with pre-lit dual color LED lights, slightly different light color but very analogous.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree but different species (Franklin Fir), taller size and different brand, less closely matched.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Davenport Fir 6.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and pre-lit fir tree but different brand and unspecified fir type, somewhat similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: LuxenHome 7 ft. Pre-Lit White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but white color and likely very different appearance and construction, low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Evergreen spruce tree, different species and possibly different construction style, not very close to downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree but smaller height and flocked (snow-covered) appearance, differing aesthetic and size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 7.5' x 44" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and species (Douglas Fir), slim design with pre-lit warm white LED lights, though from different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Feel Real technology, downswept Douglas Fir pencil slim form, very close to reference but taller.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit slim tree but different species (Virginia Pine), reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and height; flocked finish (snow-effect) differentiates style, but still quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5' Flocked British Columbia Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter height; flocked finish; different fir species; less similar in size and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 4 Foot Pre-Lit Frosted Ashcroft Fir Potted Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Ashcroft Fir), much smaller size, potted style, and frosted finish, not closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 7.5' Prelit Artificial Christmas Xmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree of similar height but unspecified species and style, lower relevancy due to lack of detail and brand difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4.5' Green Medium Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller height and different fir species (Frasier Fir), less relevant to downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 650 Clear Warm LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Larger, flocked Livingston Fir with pine cones, different style and species; some similarities in lighting but less relevant overall.
